headline: Why Is The AES Corporation (AES) Among the Best Electricity Utility Stocks to Invest In Now?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Electric Utility Stocks To Invest In. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The AES Corporation (NYSE:AES) stands against the other electric utility stocks.
